citizen_science.desc: Any member of the general public can upload an observation of any species sighted. Other members help identify, annotate and curate the observations.
citizen_science.title: Citizen Science

groups.desc: Microsites on the portal allow communities dedicated to themes of their interest to collect, curate and share content.
groups.title: Communities

landscapes.desc: Aggregating information on India’s Landscapes with detailed information on spatial boundaries, species lists and relevant literature  on it. *Coming soon*
landscapes.title: Landscapes

literature.desc: Peer reviewed and grey literature uploaded by members or in partnership with biodiversity journals, organized with metadata and tags.
literature.title: Biodiversity Literature

maps.desc: Interact online with multiple layers of spatial data served as map layers through an interactive web-GIS module.
maps.title: Maps

open_data.desc: All content on the portal is open and served under Creative Commons license for reuse and sharing with attribution to the original contributors.
open_data.title: Open Data

species_information.desc: Descriptive pages for every species of India from authenticated sources. Help collaborate and build information on India's species.
species_information.title: Species information

taxonomy.desc: Taxonomy and nomenclatural information on India’s species, allowing for dynamic updates for organizing and querying species data, curated by experts.
taxonomy.title: Taxonomy
